query.statement: SELECT FILE_ID, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, CONTENTS, POST_ID FROM MIP_ATTACH WHERE POST_ID = :POST_ID ORDER BY FILE_ID DESC

INSERT INTO MIP_ATTACH (FILE_ID, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE,CONTENTS, POST_ID) VALUES ('FILE-' || FILE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , :FILE_PATH, :FILE_NAME, :FILE_EXT, :FILE_SIZE, :CONTENTS, :POST_ID)
UPDATE MIP_ATTACH SET TITLE = :FILE_ID, :FILE_PATH, :FILE_NAME, :FILE_EXT, :FILE_SIZE,CONTENTS, :POST_ID WHERE FILE_ID = :FILE_ID
